name: Power out.
description:
You are playing your favorite game on an old CRT. But what do you hear? A thunderstorm, ready to cut off the power and this game doesn't save! beat the game before your lightning powers off your TV and you have to start all over.

A project mostly focusing on aesthetic rather than huge mechanics.  I really wanted to put out a project with decent art and sound. I wanted it to look and feel like you were playing a game on an old TV during a rain storm. 

I didn't have enough time to jump into shader graph and figure it out but I would have like to. I think that would have really helped out with the effects that I was going for.

game was made by a team of 2.

I don't own a Mac and didn't take it into consideration so I don't know if it works for Mac sorry :(.

Goal:

To collect 5 stars in the game, make sure to read the signs, they help!

Controls:

Mouse to turn on and off TV.

WSAD to move.

E to interact with signs.

ESC to exit the game.

Play time: ~15 mins

Audio recommended for full experience.
